docs.title: CasperBot Documentation
docs.text: Welcome! Use the menu above to navigate through the Wiki, Deep Dive, or Commands guide.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
List of available commands:

  • !ping – health check
  • !help – show help menu
  • !roll – roll a die (e.g. 1d20)

docs.text: This is the overview of the CasperBot wiki.
